game_description: [Quest 2 and Quest Pro only] AmazeVR Megan Thee Stallion VR Concert transports you to a futuristic and interactive world where the 3-time Grammy award winning rapper snaps, claps and twerks inches away from you. Get front-row seats to the most intimate performance you‚Äôll ever see with crystal clarity and unprecedented proximity through live-action 3D footage. What fans are saying: ‚ÄúFrom start to finish, this is what a VR concert experience should be. The quality is so crystal clear, the environments are expansive, and there‚Äôs cool interactive moments too. Can‚Äôt wait for their next one, great job AmazeVR.‚Äù - Lazer Kaboom ‚ÄúAs someone who is most definitely not part of the target demographic I friggin‚Äô LOVE this. It will become one of the go-to VR experiences to be shown to friends & family‚Äù - SirRealDeal ‚ÄúIt was so realistic I actually felt slightly embarrassed, like I was staring and maybe watching an intimate show not meant for me.‚Äù - Airy ‚ÄúLoved every second of it, super cool I can‚Äôt wait for more concerts in the future!‚Äù - Matthew Maranan The free trial offers a preview of one interactive stage. The full ‚ÄòEnter Thee Hottieverse‚Äô VR Concert Pack includes behind the scenes footage and shareable highlights from your Hottieverse experience. Megan Thee Stallion is the first of many artists to be featured on the AmazeVR app. Be on the lookout for more VR Concerts with new artists in 2023.
review_1: Great content, not a lot of replay-ability (other than showing other ppl) but deffo worth every dollar! I hope there are more (A LOT MORE) HOTTIES introduced in the HOTTIEVERSE! üíØüî•üíØ
review_2: Review must be at least 15 characters.
review_3: Hottieverse stuck at 71% and Kitty Kat at 96%, the rest is downloaded Can't find support so I'll leave this here Free space is currently 7GB with the app already taking 10+GB Update: I did a factory reset because besides the system's tendency to keep failed downloaded files, the hour's also wrong. I downloaded the whole 15GB AND IT WAS PHENOMENAL. Thank you AmazeVR for making this. The best money spent on a digital content and I'm not even a fan of Megan (but I guess I am now)
review_4: Just gives us more heres my wallet!!!
review_5: Avoid. Real shame. Its not the full songs. And the camera keeps moving around making you feel sick. Nothing like a concert. Awful controls and weird mini games. Barely any content. And you cant refund even if it doesn't work !
